frontmatter.title: Ig Isotype Biology & Response to Immunization
frontmatter.description: This table contains studies related to activation induced cytidine deaminase (gene: Aicda; protein: AID), CSR, SHM, and IgM. It also includes relevant studies on Ig classes/subclasses in model systems. This does not aim to be a comprehensive review, rather it aims to be a collection of indexes.

frontmatter.title: Influenza Biology & Viral Evolution
frontmatter.description: This table contains studies related to influenza biology and its evolution.

frontmatter.title: B Cell & Germinal Center Immunology
frontmatter.description: This table contains studies related to B cell biology especially in the context of antiviral response, germinal center formation & regulation, and B cell immunophenotyping.
